ML_AA_NAMES.AA_NAME: Deutsche Gesellschaft für Internationale Zusammenarbeit (GIZ) GmbH

ADDRESS_CONTRACTING_BODY.OFFICIALNAME: Deutsche Gesellschaft für Internationale Zusammenarbeit (GIZ) GmbH
ADDRESS_CONTRACTING_BODY.CONTACT_POINT: Leinemann Partner Rechtsanwälte mbB (z. Hd. Herrn Rechtsanwalt Hendrik Kues)

TITLE.P: 81218798 — Green finance market regulation and green bonds in Brazil

SHORT_DESCR.P: The object of the tender is to carry out activities within the framework of 2 out of 3 components of the project “Green finance market regulation land green bonds” (PN 2016.2256.2), which is being implemented in Brazil by the Deutsche Gesellschaft für internationale Zusammenarbeit (GIZ) GmbH on behalf of the Federal Ministry for Economic.
Cooperation And Development (BMZ). The aim of the overall project is: to improve the framework conditions for scaling up green finance measures to finance the sustainable development.

The object of the tender is to carry out activities within the framework of 2 out of 3 components of the project “Green finance market regulation land green bonds” (PN 2016.2256.2), which is being implemented in Brazil by the Deutsche Gesellschaft für internationale Zusammenarbeit (GIZ) GmbH on behalf of the Federal Ministry for Economic.Cooperation And Development (BMZ). The aim of the overall project is: to improve the framework conditions for scaling up green finance measures to finance the sustainable development.
The project comprises of three main field of actions:
1— enhancing political conditions aims that the topic “Green Finance Markets” gains importance in the Brazilian political agenda in,
2— regulation and supervision conditions for the implementation of regulations for the management of social and environmental risks in banks are improved,
3— market's development aims to improve conditions in the offering of green finance services in the market (Output C).
This tender refers to fields of action #2 and #3.

RENEWAL_DESCR.P: Within the framework of the basic project described in the terms of reference, GIZ reserves an option to extend the contract, according to the political developments in Brazil and Germany. The additional services would reflect conclusions made at the political level between the partners, but would probably be in a similar corridor as the present terms of reference for the same scope.

CRITERIA_CANDIDATE.P: If we receive more than 5 requests to participate, we will make a selection on the basis of the criteria laid out in the annex and invite bids only from the 5 companies with the highest scores. We reserve the right to cancel the contract award procedure if we receive fewer than 3 requests to participate.

OPTIONS_DESCR.P: Within the framework of the basic project described in the terms of reference, GIZ reserves an option to extend the contract, according to the political developments in Brazil and Germany. The additional services would reflect conclusions made at the political level between the partners, but would probably be in a similar corridor as the present Terms of Reference for the same scope. More information on this can be found in the terms of reference.

SUITABILITY.P: Evidence of commercial register entry. In case of bidding consortia: Declaration by consortium.

ECONOMIC_FINANCIAL_INFO.P: Average annual turnover for the last 3 financial years (last-but-four financial year can be included in case of invitation to tender held within 6 months of end of last financial year). At least: 2 500 000 EUR.
Number of employees as at 31.12. of the previous year: At least: 15 persons.

TECHNICAL_PROFESSIONAL_INFO.P: At least 3 reference project in the technical field financial sector development and at least 3 reference project in the region Latin America and the Caribbean in the last 3 years. The technical assessment is only based on reference projects with a minimum.

REVIEW_PROCEDURE.P: According to Article 160, Section 3 of the German Act Against Restraint of Competition, application for re-examination is not permissible insofar as:

1— the applicant has identified the claimed infringement of the contract award regulations before submitting the application for re-examination and has not submitted a complaint to the commissioning party within a period of 10 calendar days;,the expiry of the period pursuant to Article 134, Section 2 remains unaffected,

2— complaints of infringements of contract award regulations that are evident in the notice are not submitted to the commissioning party at the latest by the expiry of the deadline for the application specified in the notice or by the deadline for the submission of bids,

3— complaints of infringements of contract award regulations that 1st become evident in the tender documents are not submitted to the commissioning party at the latest by the expiry of the deadline for application or for the submission of bids,

4— more than 15 calendar days have elapsed after receipt of the notification from the commissioning party that it is unwilling to redress the complaint sentence 1 does not apply in the case of an application to determine the invalidity of the contract in accordance with Article 135, Section 1 (2). Article 134, Section 1, Sentence 2 remains unaffected.
